troubleshooting.title: Text on Buttons and Labels is Invisible for Linux Installer

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: After starting the Linux installer, the text on buttons and labels is invisible.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This seems to be a font issue between Oracle Java SE 8 (bundled with the installer) and Fedora/Gnome.

steps-informal.p:
There are two possible workarounds:
Run the installer with the default (non-native) Java L&F by using the -Dinstall4j.nolaf=true argument. For example:oxygen-64bit-openjdk.sh -Dinstall4j.nolaf=true
Run the installer in console mode using the -c argument. For example:oxygen-64bit-openjdk.sh -c
